sections.title: Inheritor’s Crusader (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Inheritor’s Crusader class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Inheritor’s Crusader)
sections.description: Inheritor's crusaders gain no additional proficiency in weapons or armor beyond their base classes.

sections.title: Spells per Day (Inheritor’s Crusader)
sections.description: Crusader levels advance spellcasting progression for cleric or paladin spells per day and effective caster level, but grant no other class features.

sections.title: Champion of Honor (Inheritor’s Crusader)
sections.description: The crusader follows the paladin code of conduct with same penalties, and crusader levels stack with paladin levels for smite evil effects.

sections.title: Aura of Great Courage (Su) (Inheritor’s Crusader)
sections.description: Grants aura of courage equivalent to a 3rd-level paladin, or increases existing aura range to 20 feet.

sections.title: Destroyer of Tyranny (Su) (Inheritor’s Crusader)
sections.description: Channel energy or lay on hands grants new saves against charm and compulsion effects, and crusader can use swift action to attempt saves against such effects on themselves.

sections.title: Sword Against Injustice (Su) (Inheritor’s Crusader)
sections.description: Divine judgment ability that automatically hits guilty targets or stops short for innocent ones, usable once per day as a standard action with fatigue for additional uses.
